column1: Uchi////Our waiter was nice that he offered our birthday girl's favorite dish as a special treat for her birthday from one of the 16 dishes
column2: the disappointing part to me was there was no candles
column3: no happy birthday words on the dessert plate
column4: not even a small tiny touch on the plate that we could sing happy birthday to our friend's 50's birthday
column5: very nice offered but nothing could compare with personal touch that could give a customer memorable moment.
